data.title: Uefadirect 3 - June 2002 - English Edition
data.meta_description:
uefadirect 3 - June 2002 - English edition - Free download as PDF File (.pdf), Text File (.txt) or read online for free. The document discusses a meeting between UEFA and club representatives where they discussed the newly approved European Club Forum. Some key points:

- The forum is intended to improve cooperation between UEFA and clubs to share expertise and find new ways of working in a changing environment. 

- At the June meeting in Nyon, club representatives welcomed the creation of the forum and agreed to form an 11-member board to get it started. 

- Attendees also discussed the future of UEFA club competitions and the European TV market, including UEFA's recent agreement with the European Commission regarding central marketing of TV rights.
